title: Facing Life’s Unexpected Challenges with Courage - An Interview with Jeff Parnell
itunes:title: Facing Life’s Unexpected Challenges with Courage - An Interview with Jeff Parnell
description: Jeff Parnell is the President & CEO of FishUSA, a leading online retailer of sport fishing products. He discusses the (positive) impact that Covid-19 has had on fishing retail, how his faith has impacted and informed his work and how an unexpected physical challenge required a new level of faith and courage.
content:encoded: Jeff Parnell is the President & CEO of FishUSA, a leading online retailer of sport fishing products. He discusses the (positive) impact that Covid-19 has had on fishing retail, how his faith has impacted and informed his work and how an unexpected physical challenge required a new level of faith and courage.
